KPOP girl group MAMAMOO's leader and powerhouse vocalist, Solar, is bringing her â€œCOLOURSâ€ stage to Hong Kong for a concert! Are you ready, YONGSOONs? "Solar 2nd CONCERT [COLOURS] IN HONG KONG" will be held on 7 July, 2024, Sunday at 8:00 PM at AsiaWorld-Expo, Runway 11!
Â 
Recently, Solar made a comeback with her new mini album, "COLOURS," and immediately took the first place on the Korean music program "The Show" with the title track "But I"! The album "COLOURS" presents six different music genres through its six tracks, and Solar, with her outstanding vocal abilities, flawlessly delivers each song.
Â 
If you have ever been moved by Solar's voice or captivated by her performances, you absolutely cannot miss Solar's first solo concert in Hong Kong!
Â
